:label.description: The content to display as the label.

name.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See MDN.
name.description_zh: 提交HTML表单时使用的输入元素的名称。参见 MDN。

size.description: The size of the Slider filler and thumb.
size.description_zh: 滑块填充物和拇指的大小。

color.type: foreground / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger
color.description: The color of the filler and thumb.

:fillOffset.description: The offset from which to start the fill.

showSteps.description: Whether to show the steps indicators.

showTooltip.description: Whether to show a tooltip with the current thumb value when the user hovers or drags the thumb.
showTooltip.description_zh: 当用户将鼠标悬停或拖动拇指时，是否显示具有当前拇指值的工具提示。

:marks.description: The marks to display on the Slider's steps.
:marks.description_zh: 要在滑块的台阶上显示的标记。

:startContent.description: The content to display at the beginning of the Slider.
:startContent.description_zh: 要在滑块开头显示的内容。

:endContent.description: The content to display at the end of the Slider.
:endContent.description_zh: 要在滑块末尾显示的内容。

:formatOptions.description: The options to format the value.
:formatOptions.description_zh: 用于设置值格式的选项。

:tooltipValueFormatOptions.description: The options to format the tooltip value. By default, it uses the same options as formatOptions.
:tooltipValueFormatOptions.description_zh: 用于设置工具提示值格式的选项。默认情况下，它使用与 formatOptions 相同的选项。

:tooltipProps.description: The props to pass to the thumbs's tooltip.
:tooltipProps.description_zh: 要传递给 thumbs 工具提示的 props。

showOutline.description: Whether to show a small outline around the thumbs.
showOutline.description_zh: 是否在拇指周围显示一个小轮廓。

hideValue.description: Whether to hide the Slider value.

hideThumb.description: Whether to hide all the Slider thumbs.
hideThumb.description_zh: 是否隐藏所有 Slider 拇指。

disableThumbScale.description: Whether to disable the thumb scale animation.
disableThumbScale.description_zh: 是否禁用拇指比例动画。

isDisabled.description: Whether the whole Slider is disabled.

disableAnimation.description: Whether to disable the Slider animations.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the Slider slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为 Slider 插槽设置自定义类名。

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: A function to format the value. Overrides default formatted number.
methods.description_zh: 用于设置值格式的函数。覆盖默认格式化的数字。

methods.name: renderLabel
methods.description: A function to render the label.

methods.name: renderValue
methods.description: A function to render the value.

methods.name: renderThumb
methods.description: A function to render the thumbs. The index prop will tell you which thumb is being rendered.
methods.description_zh: 呈现拇指的函数。index 属性将告诉您正在渲染哪个拇指。

events.name: onChange
events.description: Callback fired when the value changes.

events.name: onChangeEnd
events.description: Callback fired when the value changes and the user stops dragging the thumb.
events.description_zh: 当值更改且用户停止拖动拇指时触发回调。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The foundational slot, encompassing all other slots and elements. It serves as the primary container.
slots.description_zh: 基础插槽，包括所有其他插槽和元素。它充当主容器。

slots.name: labelWrapper
slots.description: The container for the Slider's label and value. It aligns these elements and ensures a consistent layout.
slots.description_zh: Slider 的标签和值的容器。它对齐这些元素并确保一致的布局。

slots.name: label
slots.description: A dedicated slot to display the Slider's label.
slots.description_zh: 用于显示滑块标签的专用插槽。

slots.name: value
slots.description: Displays the current value of the Slider. Located within the labelWrapper.
slots.description_zh: 显示滑块的当前值。位于标签Wrapper内。

slots.name: step
slots.description: Represents individual steps or intervals on the Slider.
slots.description_zh: 表示滑块上的各个步骤或间隔。

slots.name: mark
slots.description: Denotes specific values or intervals along the Slider.
slots.description_zh: 表示沿滑块的特定值或间隔。

slots.name: trackWrapper
slots.description: A container for the slider's track, ensuring it is consistently aligned and positioned.
slots.description_zh: 滑块轨道的容器，确保其始终对齐和定位。

slots.name: track
slots.description: The base bar of the Slider, along which the thumb moves.
slots.description_zh: 滑块的底栏，拇指沿该底栏移动。

slots.name: filler
slots.description: A visual representation of the selected value, filling the track from the start point to the current thumb position.
slots.description_zh: 所选值的可视化表示，填充从起点到当前拇指位置的轨迹。

slots.name: thumb
slots.description: The interactive element that users drag along the track to select a value on the Slider.
slots.description_zh: 用户沿轨道拖动以选择滑块上的值的交互式元素。

slots.name: startContent
slots.description: A slot for additional content or icons at the beginning of the Slider.
slots.description_zh: 滑块开头的附加内容或图标的插槽。

slots.name: endContent
slots.description: A slot for additional content or icons at the end of the Slider.
slots.description_zh: 滑块末尾的附加内容或图标的插槽。
